Headline: #201 Central/Ridge Temporary Reroute at Church/Oak
ShortDescription: 201 Central/Ridge buses are temporarily rerouted via Church, Benson, Elgin, Church and Chicago due to, street blockage near Church/Oak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#201 Central/Ridge buses are temporarily rerouted via Church, Benson, Elgin, Church and Chicago due to, street blockage near Church/Oak.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Touhy/California
ShortDescription: Eastbound 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Touhy, Western, and Lunt: due to, street blockage near Touhy/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Touhy, Western, and Lunt: due to, street blockage near Touhy/California.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Ogden
ShortDescription: Westbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via  Van Buren, Ogden, Harrison, Western and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Ogden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via  Van Buren, Ogden, Harrison, Western and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Ogden.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare- bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Harlem. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Harlem.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
